reviewText: **Updated 6/7/10** I grew up watching these as a seperate show & I think they are wonderful. But they were originally a part of the Rocky & Bullwinkle show, and they are included in those seasonal sets. The number before the title is the Dudley Do-Right sequence number, not the Rocky Show number. From the Rocky & Bullwinkle season 1 DVD set: Rocky & Bullwinkle & Friends - The Complete First Season 3) Stokey the Bear 6) The Masked Ginny Lynn From the Rocky & Bullwinkle season 2 DVD set: Rocky & Bullwinkle & Friends - The Complete Second Season 9) Foreclosing mortgages 15) Out of Uniform 16) Lure of the Footlights 17) Bullet-proof Suit 18) Miracle Drug 19) Elevenworth Prison 22) Mother Whiplashe's Log Jam From the Rocky & Bullwinkle season 3 DVD set: Rocky & Bullwinkle & Friends - The Complete Third Season 26) Faithful Dog 30) Canadian Railway's Bridge 31) Niagra Falls 33) Marigolds 34) Trading Places From the Rocky & Bullwinkle season 4 DVD set: Rocky & Bullwinkle & Friends: Season 4 (2pc) 38) Matinee Idol
i love classic cartoons,and dudley do-right is right there with the best of them.do-right,nell,horse...they're all back from the past to make you laugh all over again;enjoy!

I would like to state that I am not a serious collector of these videos.  My purpose was to recreate a childhood memory for my children.  They loved Dudley Do-Right and his sense of right.  It was a great memory to share with my children.

The episodes on this dvd are fantastic!  Complete with Snidley foreclosing mortgages, and everything else that made this mini found on the Rocky and Bullwinkle show outstanding!

Episodes:

Stokey the Bear

the Masked Ginny Lynn

Foreclosing mortgages

Out of Uniform

Lure of the Footlights

Bullet-proof Suit

Miracle Drug

Elevenworth Prison

Mother Whiplashe's Log Jam

Faithful Dog

Canadian Railway's Bridge

Niagra Falls

Marigolds

Trading Places

Matinee Idol

And for those of you who happen to own the season 1 and 2 DVDs that may contain some of these episodes there is an incentive to buying this DVD.  The special feature is the original Bullwinkle sock-puppet inroductions to the episodes.  A must have for any fan.
thankyou very much
Dudley Do-Right is fun for any age. I recommend it.
I like some cartoons and Dudley Do  right and Nell

All that I have to say is this: This show ( in my opinion) is better than the movie. this DVD has 15 episodes of the show. Every episode is just brimming with humor. Excellent voice casting makes this DVD worth watching. The movie was ok, but it just wasn't as good as the show.
Funny, Great Entertainment for the kiddos.

The Best of Dudley Do-Right, Vol. 1  was funny and wish "Classic Media" studios would finish Vol. 2 or make a complete dvd set of the series! DreamWorks Entertainment should consider reworking "Dudley Do-Right" into a updated cgi, full length, animated feature film like they did by with "Mr. Peabody and Sherman".
Grankids love it.

I loved this cartoon so much as a child, and now that I am reliving some old stuff from my childhood I love it just as much....so I had to have this dvd in my collection.....always loved the shorts from Rocky and Bullwinkle so much more than the actual show.....worth every penny....no a Vol. II please....

This is fun old drama updated with crazy cartoons.  Dudley is clueless, and must be rescued by Nell much of the time. Meanwhile other characters are running their own agenda's creating wonderful confusion.
So funny! Took me back as a little kid ( just a big kid now!) call for Superchicken. Bokack!!! Yeah,
I grew up watching this at my grandparents house. I bought it for my 5 year old son as a stocking stuffer. I can't wait to watch it with him!

It seems like a very, very long time ago that I first remember seeing this cartoon.  I can remember really laughing out loud even though I probably didn't understand the comedy.  When I found this DVD available I jumped at the chance to add it to my library and am very happy that I did.  The episodes are just as funny as I remember them being if not moreso because now I understand what is being said.  I highly recommend this DVD to any family who wants to enjoy some good, clean humour.  One of the best purchases I have made in quite some time.
I like this cartoon.  I remember it from the 1960's.  I wanted it becuse I decided to be Snidley Whiplash for Halloween.
Truly one of the greatest TV dumb guys, Dudley Do-Right had it all- witty dialogue, great music and bad puns. Still funny after all these years. I hope there is a Vol. 2 pretty soon.
So where are the rest?? hillarious , great fun, but at least 23 more episodes exist, the episodes are so good ,do your self a favour and get these !

This volume was released in 2005. Where is Volume 2?
The beauty of these specific collections, as opposed to the Rocky and Bullwinkle sets, you get to watch one episode of Dudley after another. I love everything there is about the Dudley Do-Right episodes, but my favorite little "joke" is the "played by" classics seen in many of the episodes. The best ... Dudley played by Sid Gould. Dudley's horse played by Sid Gould's horse. Ya gotta laugh at that one ... especially if you know who Sid Gould was!
If you are a Dudley fan and you don't own this DVD shame on you!
This is an excellent collection from a classic cartoon.  The person who picked the shows did a good job.  One caution:  there is no closed captioning (and I wish there would have been).
Silliness prevails!  Dudley Do Right is hilarious and a wonderful romp through the past.

I feel like I am a kid again when I watch this DVD.  I used to get up at 6 AM to watch this classic cartoon and now I can watch it when I want.  Highly recommended to those who grew up on these classic cartoons and would like a walk down memory lane or those individuals who don't know what classics are!
These Cartoons are some of the classics, they can't compare to the new digital computer generated cartoons but, if you are of the era that I'm from you know that these cartoons just can't be beat.
Learning lessons, don't do wrong, you're goanna get caught.
Love it as a him and now my grandson can watch him
Classic!!
I love this classical collection of cartoons.

Great cartoons! Was decorating the house for a 'Dudley Do-Right' themed party. We bought two of these. One to play in the background on the TV while the other was given away as a prize. Bought up some childhood memories, I appreciated the nostalgia. With the price, great flash back material.
Great
It will be a pleasure to see this cartoon again after all these years. I haven't seen them in over twenty years. Think you very much for having this cartoon. It will be a  pleasure to see them again.
For less than $5, I got fifteen episodes of "Dudley Do-Right" and that's awesome. Love the humor and a fast watch. Easy to enjoy in one sitting. Hopefully, they'll release the complete series. :)
Gave as a gift
Fun to watch episodes of the past!
